name: command-generator
title: Command Generator
description: Describe functionality in natural language and receive production-ready Raycast commands.
author: nbbaier

commands.name: manage-generated-commands
commands.title: Manage Generated Commands
commands.description: View and manage your AI-generated commands

tools.name: generate-typescript-command
tools.title: Generate TypeScript Command
tools.description: Generates a React-based Raycast command with UI components. Use this when the user wants to create a command with a visual interface.

tools.name: generate-script-command
tools.title: Generate Script Command
tools.description: Generates a standalone script command (Bash, JavaScript, or TypeScript). Use this for simple automation without UI.

tools.name: analyze-command
tools.title: Analyze Command
tools.description: Analyzes existing Raycast command code and provides explanations or improvement suggestions.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
